name: Elasticsearch s3 snapshot register IAM user policy.txt - IAM PassRole Policy
description: This section outlines an IAM (Identity and Access Management) policy that grants permission to the 'PassRole' action. PassRole allows an AWS service or resource to assume a specific role, enabling it to perform actions and access resources permitted by that role. This policy is likely used to grant Elasticsearch the necessary permissions to assume a role with access to an S3 bucket for snapshot operations.
use_cases: Enabling secure data transfer between AWS services

name: Elasticsearch s3 snapshot register IAM user policy.txt - ElasticsearchHttpPut Policy
description: This section outlines an IAM policy that grants permissions for an Elasticsearch service to perform specific actions. It allows the service to assume a role named 'es-snapshot-role' and perform the 'ESHttpPut' action on a specific Elasticsearch domain. This policy enables the Elasticsearch service to upload data or snapshots to the specified domain.
use_cases: Configuring IAM permissions for Elasticsearch service
Enabling Elasticsearch to upload data or snapshots
